arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
اَللَّهُمَّ ارْزُقْنِيْ فِيْهِ فَضْلَ لَيْلَةِ القَدْرِ
وَصَيِّرْ أُمُورِ فِيْهِ مِنَ العُسْرِ إِلَى اليُسْرِ
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
O Allah; on this day, (please] provide me with the merits of the Grand Night,
And convert my affairs from difficulty into easiness,
And let off my sins and burdens;
O He Who is kind with His righteous servants.
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
waṣayyir umūri fīhi minal `usri ilal yusr
